item.description:
UPDATE 6/18: I won't be able to make the hike because of an injury. If anyone wants to be the point of contact please let me know! - Andy


Let's do a little cross training this weekend with a hike of the Middlesex Fells Skyline Trail.

The trail follows the outer perimeter of the western Fells. There are great views of Boston and the surrounding area. Most of the Skyline trail is in wooded landscape, with several steep ascents to rocky outcrops.

You can view a trail map HERE.

The trail is 6.9 miles and average hiking time is 5 hours. It is considered a difficult hike and my plan is to keep things moving with minimal breaks for water, snacks, etc.

Please bring sturdy footgear, insect repellent, sun block, food and at least a liter of water.

This event is dependent on the weather and the current forecast calls for 75 degrees and showers, but we'll keep an eye on it and pray for sun!

We will meet at the Sheepfold parking area off of route 28 (see directions below). For those of you who are not dog lovers you should know that the Sheepfold area is a popular place for dog owners to meet and let their animals run free. Dogs are often on the trails as well.

Meeting time is 9am and we will head out promptly at 9:15. I will send my cell number out to attendees so that you can call me if you're running late.

Hope you can make it!

Andy

Directions to Sheepfold

MBTA:
Orange Line to Wellington Station, MBTA bus #100 to Roosevelt Circle Rotary, walk south to the rotary, turn right on South Border Road, Bellevue Pond is 1/5 mile right on South Border Road. Sheepfold section exit on Elm Street, walk north on Route 28 about one mile underneath the overpass, sign is on the left.

By Car:
From North 93 South to exit 35 at stop take a left under highway at next stop sign take a right at first set of lights (rt28) take a right for Sheepfold entrance.

From south 93 North to exit 33(RT28N) for Sheepfold - go N 1.8 miles to reservation entrance. Follow the road inside to the parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a bright yellow running hat.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Hike The Skyline Trail at Middlesex Fells
